name: Duty first
description:
You've been waiting for that concert for years. It would be a shame if your sweetheart had some urgent work to do and called off your date...

This is a short adventure game made for the AdvXJam (14-28 November 2020) whose theme was: "A Good Time"

Left click to interact, right click to examine. Esc pauses the game. F5 to save, F7 to load, F9 skips to main menu.

Suggested graphics settings: keep nearest-neighbour as scaling method. It's a pixel art game, interpolation would make everything look horrible.
